page.title: 15Education (cont.)
page.content:
Built on traditional lines,the school has nine classrooms,a hall/gymnasium , kitchen and seperate dining room the extensive and attractive grounds, include garden and study areas as well as a playing field and learner swimming pool.
The school offers a wide_range of extra cutticular activities which include various sports,dancing, drame, chess and a nature club. The school Friday Club,open to all pupils, has regular filmshows,games evenings and disco's. Parents' Open Evenings are held each term and parents are encouraged to play a part in the life of the school by attending meetings and social events and by working with the staff in the classroom.
